$eref.description: Sent whenever a new user is created in SaaSquatch program where the classic program is enabled.
$eref.title: Classic User Created Webhook Schema

_88classicShareLinks.description: Links this user can share to make referrals
_88classicShareLinks.title: Share Links

___emailShareLink.description: The share link tracked with EMAIL share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium
___emailShareLink.title: Email Share Link

___mobileEmailShareLink.description: The share link tracked with EMAIL share medium and MOBILE engagement medium
___mobileEmailShareLink.title: Mobile Email Share Link

___twitterShareLink.description: The share link tracked with TWITTER share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium
___twitterShareLink.title: Twitter Share Link

___MOBILE.description: A list of share links associated with the MOBILE engagement medium
___MOBILE.title: Mobile Widget Share Links

___HOSTED.description: A list of share links associated with the HOSTED engagement medium
___HOSTED.title: Hosted Widget Share Links

___linkedinShareLink.description: The share link tracked with LINKEDIN share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium
___linkedinShareLink.title: LinkedIn Share Link

___POPUP.description: A list of share links associated with the POPUP engagement medium
___POPUP.title: Popup Widget Share Links

___shareLink.description: The share link tracked with DIRECT share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium
___shareLink.title: Direct Share Link

___mobileFacebookShareLink.description: The share link tracked with FACEBOOK share medium and MOBILE engagement medium
___mobileFacebookShareLink.title: Mobile Facebook Share Link

___EMAIL.description: A list of share links associated with the EMAIL engagement medium
___EMAIL.title: Email Widget Share Links

___facebookShareLink.description: The share link tracked with FACEBOOK share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium
___facebookShareLink.title: Facebook Share Link

___mobileTwitterShareLink.description: The share link tracked with TWITTER share medium and MOBILE engagement medium
___mobileTwitterShareLink.title: Mobile Twitter Share Link

___EMBED.description: A list of share links associated with the EMBED engagement medium
___EMBED.title: Embedded Widget Share Links

___mobileShareLink.description: The share link tracked with DIRECT share medium and MOBILE engagement medium
___mobileShareLink.title: Mobile Direct Share Link

___emailShareLink.title: Email Share Link

___twitterShareLink.title: Twitter Share Link

___facebookShareLink.title: Facebook Share Link

___linkedinShareLink.title: LinkedIn Share Link

___emailHash.description: An MD5 has of this user's email address
___emailHash.title: Email Hash

___lastInitial.description: The initial of the user's last name
___lastInitial.title: Last Initial

___paymentProviderId.description: Unique user identifier for tenants using a v1 payment provider integration (e.g. Stripe/Recurly)
___paymentProviderId.title: Payment Provider Id

___segments.description: Any segments this user belongs to
___segments.title: User Segments

___customFields.description: Any custom fields set for this user
___customFields.title: Custom Fields

___dateBlocked.description: The date the referral was blocked
___dateBlocked.title: Date Blocked

___referralSource.description: The source of the referral as defined by referral cookie (deprecated)
___referralSource.title: Referral Source

___imageUrl.description: The URL to an image of this user
___imageUrl.title: Image Url

___cookieId.description: The anonymous cookie user identifier associated with this user if applicable (see anonymous users)
___cookieId.title: Anonymous Cookie User Id

___referredByCodes.description: Any codes used to refer this user
___referredByCodes.title: Referred By Codes

___dateCreated.description: A timestamp of the date this user was created
___dateCreated.title: Date Created

___lastSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were most recently seen by SaaSquatch
___lastSeenIP.title: Last Seen IP

___referralCode.description: The referral code this user will share to refer others
___referralCode.title: Referral Code

___firstSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were first seen by SaaSquatch
___firstSeenIP.title: First Seen IP

___referable.description: True if this user can be referred in a program by other users
___referable.title: Referable
